mapper.insert: INSERT INTO account_count(id, sumBalance, sumAvailableAmount, sumFreezeAmount, sumEbaoBalance, sumEbaoAvailableAmount, sumEbaoFreezeAmount, allInvestorsNums, allUserNums, userNumsPerDay, sumWithdrawMoneyPerDay, sumRechargeMoneyPerDay, time,accountUserNums,allinvestNums) VALUES(#{id}, #{sumBalance}, #{sumAvailableAmount}, #{sumFreezeAmount}, #{sumEbaoBalance}, #{sumEbaoAvailableAmount}, #{sumEbaoFreezeAmount}, #{allInvestorsNums}, #{allUserNums}, #{userNumsPerDay}, #{sumWithdrawMoneyPerDay}, #{sumRechargeMoneyPerDay}, #{time},#{accountUserNums},#{allinvestNums})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM account_count ORDER BY time DESC
